data.title: Why Is It So Difficult to Regulate Tech Monopolies?
data.text: Investor's don't believe that regulators will be able to break up modern monopolies

data.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Announces Pluton Processor: Key Takeaways
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT) working on Pluton processor chips to improve security for Windows' users.

data.title: Alphabet vs. Microsoft: Hope You Made Money
data.text: As an investment idea, Google's parent company Alphabet's stock has shown strong returns versus Microsoft's stock Alphabet stock is up 40% compared to a rise of about 25% for Microsoft stock since we first surfaced the upside opportunity in Alphabet vs. Microsoft six months ago in April.
